Text:
I dont understand the way this has been encoded:
CD1 is 800x336, but in fact it encompasses two black bars to make a real 800x452 !
Then surprise, the CD2 is of a different format :
640x272. !!!
No doubt that its impossible to join them, AVI demux or not, that TMPGenc refuses to resize the CD2 
Very surprising from WAF group, such errances..

Stay away, but dwnload this one:

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6379497/Stealing_Beauty_(1996)_DVDRip_712x430_(1013x430_anamorphic)_Eng_

Perfect.
